website_summaries.verdict: With a wide mouth and easy-to-clean design, this affordable entry does a good job extracting juice from a variety of fruits and vegetables.
pros: Extracts juices efficiently thanks to the masticating motor and cool attachments you can use to make frozen treats or even tofu
Very easy to use, from setup to cleanup
cons: Some of its plastic components feel delicate
May need to chop harder fruits and veggies before use

customer_reviews.title: Bad outweighs the Good of this unit
customer_reviews.text: This machine is really good for apples and various berries. It does great with oranges and grapefruit. My bigggest and most pressing concern is with root vegetables such as carrots and beets. The motor gets terribly slow and struggles even when cut into 1” chunks. Since carrots ate base for 80% of my juicing, you can see my dilemma. My other issue is the pulp ejection port cloggs far to easily and makes juicing withbthis machine verybtedious. It’s a shame too because it’s easily assembled and disassembled making cleaning a breeze. I’m contemplating returning to Amazon as it’s just not up to par.
customer_reviews.author: Gary F

customer_reviews.title: Maximize your juice potential
customer_reviews.text: I've been searching for a cheaper masticating juicer that works well for a while and finally found one. I was using a centrifugal juicer for a while and noticed that I don't get as much juice as I would from my local juice shop that used a really nice masticating juicer. When I looked up theirs, it was way too expensive to justify for a few juices a month. I get this one and I'm maximizing my juicing now without a lot of waste. Absolutely amazing. Such a great deal. I highly recommend this juicer for anyone who doesn't juice on a daily basis but wants to get the most juice out of fewer vegetables.
customer_reviews.author: iHeli

customer_reviews.title: fast juice maker
customer_reviews.text: this machine is bigger than i expected. it is easy to assemble. i use it to make lemon juice, it is so easy and quick, please check the video.
customer_reviews.author: Love Love Life

customer_reviews.title: MY JUICER BROKE
customer_reviews.text: GREAT JUICER BUT IT BROKE AFTER 3 MONTHS OF USE. I HAVENT BEEN ABLE TO GET ANOTHER STRAINER NEITHER FROM SELLER OR MAKER TERRIBLE SERVICE WHEN IT COMES TO TRECH SUPPORT OR COSTUMER SERVICE, IN THE WEB YOU DONT EVEN HAVE A PHONE TO CONTACT THEM. I AM STOCK AFTER 100 DLLS INVESTED IN MY HEALTH AND A JUICER THAT WORKS FINE BUT IMPOSSIBLE TO FIX IF IT BREAKS...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Works great and is quick. No pulp in the juice and it tastes great. Juices greens well and quickly. My only complaint is that fibrous veges like celery get stuck in the shoot pretty easily and clog up part of the pulp hole. Have to cut them pretty small and clean out the hole when juicing a stalk.
customer_reviews.author: chrystal hedlin

customer_reviews.title: Great juicer
customer_reviews.text: Received last week & used daily. I enjoy the size of the feeding tube. I was able to scoop berries with measuring cup & feed into juicer. I was able to quarter medium sized apples to put through. I loved keeping the spout closed so fruit juices mixed while making fruit punch. I also used the smaller feeder in the back for celeries & carrots. The pulp spout got clogged with the celery pulp. That’s one of the reasons for 4 stars as well as I had to scrub quite a bit with the brush to clean the sieve.
customer_reviews.author: MPL11238

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, works well
customer_reviews.text: This juicer works very well, I first juiced beets and carrots, and it had no problems at all. it juiced apples quicker than I could add them. the only issue I have with it is the strainer is a little bit difficult to clean. might take 3 minutes to create an 8oz glass of carrot juice and about 4-5 minutes to clean the strainer and other parts.

customer_reviews.title: easy clean basket hooked me
customer_reviews.text: After reviewing several different machines and watching many youtube videos of people using their juicers and having to work real hard to clean out their metal baskets with a toothbrush or similar, I chose this unit because of the easy clean basket, and it truly is easy to clean, practically just rinse it out. To make life easier on yourself, make sure to cut celery into short pieces, that way there are not long strings to have to deal with.
customer_reviews.author: william boelke

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I am new to juicing so I researched juicers and came up with this as my best option. The price point is good and the reviews said easy to clean. Those were the 2 big points I was looking for. The ease of cleaning is great. It comes apart really easy and doesn’t make me dread using it. The juice is so good and doesn’t have any pulp in t. I’ve been using it for a week and look forward to many more years of juicing. If you are looking to start juicing and unsure of what one to buy look no further. This will get you going!!
customer_reviews.author: Coffee conasewer

customer_reviews.title: Plastic is cheap and will crack
customer_reviews.text: This was a great juicer though the pulp is very wet and chunky. It was fast and quiet and relatively inexpensive. However it only lasted 3 months. The plastic parts are quite cheap and or course after grinding hard thinks like carrots and beets it was bound to break. Tried contacting amazon and then the customer service. Said they’d mail me a new part and after 2 attempts and them saying they sent one I never received. Back to my 15 yr old omega juicer which is loud and centrifugal but at least it’s a workhorse. Still shopping for a masticating juicer that is easy to clean and will last.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Herr

customer_reviews.title: Comparable Price and Easy to Use!
customer_reviews.text: This is really a nice slow masticating juicer, which is very easy to use and clean! This juicer can extract as much of juicer as possible. I can very easily use this juicer to make all kinds of juice that my kid likes very much! In addition, the price is also very reasonable compared to all the other similar slow masticating juice, i really recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Sophiaxx

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy with this juicer
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this juicer. I highly recommend as everything works perfect easy to clean easy to assemble lots of juices. 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Melodie Solis

customer_reviews.title: Crazy amount of pulp after one week.
customer_reviews.text: This works great for juicing, but it came with a broken lid, and a broken plug that holds the juice in. It worked great for juicing with no pulp mixed in for the first week of using it three times a day, but now the juice has an incredible amount of pulp to the point that it feels very gross to drink. It's unfortunate, because it worked absolutely amazing for the first week.
customer_reviews.author: David Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Great juicer.
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I really like this juicer. It's quiet, easy to assemble and disassemble. Easy to clean and yields a good amount of juice. Only reason I gave it a 4 instead of a 5 is the design of the spout to put your fruits and veggies in, it really works against you. If they fix this design flaw I'd give it a 5.
customer_reviews.author: M.angel Velez

customer_reviews.title: Having fun with it!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! I just started using it today. Having used it and cleaned it twice already, I feel like a pro. It took me a few minutes to set up, but now it’s super quick and easy. I just rinsed it all in the sink and put it back together. The containers are great—I use the small one for juice and the large one to catch the remains. I’m on Jason Vale’s juice diet and it’s perfect. The chute is plenty big. I didn’t even have to core the apples, I just quartered them. Sweet!!
customer_reviews.author: Robyn Bruneau

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and clean. Versatile for juicing and dessert.
customer_reviews.text: Love making my juices in morning. Especially love making the ice cream with my frozen fruit. Only concern is plastic creaking when pressings through some harder vegetables and fruits. Hasn't cracked yet.
customer_reviews.author: D Sherlock

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean strainer
customer_reviews.text: Ive been juicing for a few years now. Just bought this and tested it. Its very easy to clean the strainer. Usually small ones are harder to clean and this one is med size. Also juicing, the excess waste from this was pretty dry, which is good. And putting it together and disassembling it, is somewhat frustrating but its only due to me being new with this machine. Overall i really like it.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Haendiges

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 3 months of use/
customer_reviews.text: Updated review. Was great while it worked. Broke after 3 months. Didn’t even put anything harder then and apple there. How are you suppose to use it? And I paid $100 for it?! Would expect better quality.
customer_reviews.author: kit deng

customer_reviews.title: Awesome juicer
customer_reviews.text: I don't usually write a review on product but this time I have too. Because this is the best juicer that I have ever use. Great and awesome juicer that does not make noise which I love it when making my juice. Overall, it is best juicer machine with easy to clean and easy to assembly. I am not very happy with my product I made with caynel ☺☺☺☺☺☺
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use and extract a lot more juice than a normal blender
customer_reviews.text: I try to make smoothie and all kinds of healthy juice with the masticating juicer. It's very easy to use and clean with not much noise. It does a great job extracting juice from all kinds of food I throw in. I also really like the design and the color. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Jz999

customer_reviews.title: Only ONE week of use
customer_reviews.text: I received this item less than 2 weeks ago and the yellow rubber (see pic) broke!!!! Super annoying because I really do like the juicer...I've previously ordered the braville juice and decided to return it after less than a month of use because i was not happy with it performances ( the pulp came out wet and I had to squeeze them again by hand) . So after reading reviews about this juicer, I got it but now this happened in less than a week. Super disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Light Weight
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that it's so light weight and easy to clean. I just wish the opening was bigger or had a different cover vs. the flap. But it works. I have also found that carrots can be hard on the filter. Might be because I put too much in at a time or they are just too hard, but it cracked my filter. I asked for a replacement filter and they are sending me a new one. Thank you Caynel
customer_reviews.author: Lisa P.

customer_reviews.title: Good jucier
customer_reviews.text: I bought for jucing celery. Its good juicer but you have to prep cutting to smaller pieces prevent jamming. Prep work is needed. Its easy assemble and clean.
customer_reviews.author: asfia

customer_reviews.title: New to juicing
customer_reviews.text: I'm so happy with my Caynel juicer! It was delivered with no problems. Assembly was very easy! I made my first batch of orange juice. The process was simple and the juice was delicious! Clean was also super easy with the brush that was included. Great juicer for first timers and pros.
customer_reviews.author: Chandra McClary

customer_reviews.title: Great take the time to make friends with it
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t like it at first but..... I used it more and it became easier to use. The celery was a pain because the strings got caught up in the exit compartment however if you strip the strings from the celery it’s so amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Martin silver

customer_reviews.title: It didn’t come with the scrub free Strainer
customer_reviews.text: I love this juicer it works great just disappointed that it didn’t come with a scrub free Strainer like it was advertised.. the strainer and the hole where the food mulch comes out is the hardest thing to clean on this machine...
customer_reviews.author: edward gibson

customer_reviews.title: Feeding mouth is not good at all
customer_reviews.text: Machine is good, but the feeding mouth not at all. The style of the feeding mouth make fruits get stock between the seal of the mouth and other seal it have inside.
customer_reviews.author: Pedro A.

customer_reviews.title: not too loud :)
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice juicer, not too loud, works well, easy to clean (using the brush that comes with it). I like this juicer a lot, and have been using it regularly, due to ease of assembly and cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: The Caynel juice extracter is ready to go out the box. The color is beautiful and fits well in my kitchen. Assembly is a snap and clan up is relatively easy. The product does work as promised and I am satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: HUHWHAT?

customer_reviews.title: just ok.
customer_reviews.text: I don't like that before using this thing I have to chop celery into small pieces. I cant just throw them in a long piece because it will tighten the juicer and too I cant take them out and clean it.
customer_reviews.author: lvy

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: The pulp constantly get stuck in machine, can’t wait to replace this item
customer_reviews.author: Yourmajesty

customer_reviews.title: Juuuuuuice
customer_reviews.text: So happy to have bought this. It's well made and easy to use. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: JA

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good juicer, especially considering the low price for the masticating type. My only complaint is that the pulp gets impacted in the chute so badly that it is not possible to use the rinse with water feature.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah C.

customer_reviews.title: Could be better.
customer_reviews.text: I like the design but it just keeps breaking the company is nice and replaces parts but I just want it to work maybe the new models are better.
customer_reviews.author: SJ

customer_reviews.title: Broken inside of TWO MONTHS
customer_reviews.text: I've had this since mid February. Two months. Today the motor simply stopped working. Normal use, once every 2 days for personal use. Just to juice celery. Completely broken after 2 months. Maybe 25 uses. Total crap product!!
customer_reviews.author: joshua schutter

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic juicer! It is super easy to clean, gets a lot of juice out of fruits/vegetables, and is really quiet. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Not good for daily juicing. Doesn't work well.
customer_reviews.text: Not happy with this Juicer or their costomer service. Never even got back to me. Spend your money elsewhere. Not for a daily juicer.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: Amazing little juicer!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this juicer! I just received it and it’s so easy to use! It was very quiet and little to no pulp was left in the juice! I highly recommend it! I do not regret buying it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this juicer
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean and juices better than I expected. I previously had an extraction juicer and it was difficult to clean and very loud. This unit operates rather quietly.
customer_reviews.author: Brendon Lake

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Worked great until it didn’t. It worked normal I struggled to get it apart from the machine to clean and now it doesn't work at all. I just want a juicer that works this is the second brand I’ve tried.
customer_reviews.author: MLM

customer_reviews.title: This is a very good masticating juicer for the price
customer_reviews.text: I like this product it was easy to put together and it worked very well. It does a great job on squeezing all the juice and it's very easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: Mark Morcombe

customer_reviews.title: Good juicer for the price
customer_reviews.text: I love how easy it is to use but celery and carrots do get stuck in pulp feeder.
customer_reviews.author: demonte

customer_reviews.title: It's very quiet
customer_reviews.text: This juicer is now my favourite kitchen gadget It squeezes all the juice out of the fruit and vegetables and the juice tastes great!
customer_reviews.author: tricia cooper-fortune

customer_reviews.title: The pulp does not come out of the discharge port
customer_reviews.text: The pulp gets stuck in the juicer which makes the clean up difficult, the parts get stuck due to the pulp getting impacted into the discharge port.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tasty
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! This machine makes the best organce juice I have never had! Very easy and convenient to use.
customer_reviews.author: Pei Qiu

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Its broked after the 3rd day. They made that cup inside from plastic so just need some time and that's gonna broke if you use beets, or ginger or any harder. Even if you cut the smallest pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Csaba Olah

customer_reviews.title: It was great until it wasn't
customer_reviews.text: Had this product since May and it is now July when it just stopped working all of a sudden.
customer_reviews.author: Prime Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far the machine works as promised . I like the size. Have recommended it to others.
customer_reviews.text: There should be a book of suggested vegetable and fruit blends . Also can lemons, lime and oranges be used in machine. if so should they be peeled first?
customer_reviews.author: Grammygrantee

customer_reviews.title: More than the worth
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product No need to buy an expensive juicer ,this is the best juicer..more than the worth
customer_reviews.author: Nagaraju D.

customer_reviews.title: Broke the first time it was used.
customer_reviews.text: The filter assembly(made out of plastic and metal) broke the first time it was used.
customer_reviews.author: james beckwith

customer_reviews.title: Excellent juicer
customer_reviews.text: I love this machine it's quieter than my blender.. leaves the pulp very dry..
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Pincay

customer_reviews.title: It does the job as expected!
customer_reviews.text: Love my first Caynel Masticated juicer!!! I've been using for more than 30 days now. It's easy to use and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley DeLeon

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Good product for the amount of money paid, Seller collaboration is great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Nice juicer !!! Great for my first time juicing!!! I’d recommend !!
customer_reviews.author: Tish

customer_reviews.title: Excellent juicer
customer_reviews.text: I like it! It’s too silent. Easy to clean and great price. That’s what I wanted!
customer_reviews.author: Anhelina

customer_reviews.title: I have loved it. Let’s face it
customer_reviews.text: I have loved it. Let’s face it, juicers are never a breeze a clean, but this one isn’t bad, 10 minutes tops to thoroughly clean it. The yield is good, I don’t like pulp at all, so I strain my carrot juices.. I would buy it again, it's a great juicer for this price ran
customer_reviews.author: YJRACING

customer_reviews.title: Fragile Fragile Fragile
customer_reviews.text: Terribly delicate. The juicing filter has cracked completely after using it to juice wheatgrass. I heard a snapping, breaking sound the SECOND time using this fragile little thing. I understand that one must be careful with masticating juicers; putting frozen fruits, Fibrous veggies, etc is asking for problems...however I was juicing wheatgrass and only my second go. Purchased on a lightning deal, even so I should expect to be able to use such a product for at least a year before the equipment starts to fail. Seriously disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Crazy creek

customer_reviews.title: Love my juicer
customer_reviews.text: love this machine , it does what it claim to do . been using it almost everyday the past two month since I got . the only down side I would say , is when you are trying to wash it , could be quite difficult to separate , dissemble it. coz the fibers from the vegi or fruit easily get stocked at the bottom. and be aware this machine doesn't come with factory warranty nor a very professional written manual . but for its price , I would say worth the purchase . and I like it
customer_reviews.author: J.C

customer_reviews.title: The Caynel Cold Press Juicer
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed with this juicer. It is quiet, it is very easy to assemble it can sit in the counter top without getting in the way. I enjoyed juicing 2 bags of celery in less than 6 minutes. It is the best I've seen so far this juicer makes you wanna use it. You can use it early in the morning or late at night and no one would be disturbed. I'm so proud of myself. Thank you Caynel.
customer_reviews.author: Desiree M

customer_reviews.title: The larger chute make it easier to not chop everything small.
customer_reviews.text: I had cheaper cold press juicer that didn't work at all, always felt like i was drinking apple sauce. This one through work great, no more bits or chunks in the juice. Caynel is easing to assemble, the large mouth work great for not having to chop everything down into pieces. Beautiful color in red match my kitchen, even through it little taller then kitchen cabinets when full assemble. The one thing not really a con on the machine but the instruction. It came with a ice cream filter but no information on how to use it. But other then that I'm really happy to have brought this.
customer_reviews.author: Podppb

customer_reviews.title: Hard to clean
customer_reviews.text: The unit consists of many parts and it is really a big deal to clean it after use. I had to ask someone to help me every time I needed to open it for cleaning. The juice had lots of bits. I would not buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Iredeto

customer_reviews.title: Best entry level juicer on the market
customer_reviews.text: This thing works like a dream for the price. Not the easiest juicer to clean, but makes up for it in all around performance. I have used it a few times, and getting a hang of the cleaning so I wouldn't say that's a huge down fall. I'd rate this overall 5 star!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was hoping for, but my bad
customer_reviews.text: The merchant was great in my return as I was hoping for more speed and more extraction.
customer_reviews.author: Geneva P. De Rouge

customer_reviews.title: So hard to clean
customer_reviews.text: Nothing in the box explain how to open and clean that’s very difficult to use I spent one hour
customer_reviews.author: leah

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!!
customer_reviews.text: I should have brought a juicer earlier. I'm getting good results juicing.
customer_reviews.author: Chill

customer_reviews.title: Carnelian cold press juicer
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Great juicer for price! I posted it on Facebook and raved about it! Would recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: I. Vasquez

product_meta.title: Caynel Slow Masticating Juicer Cold Press Extractor with 3" Wide Chute for Fruits, Vegetables and Herbs, Quiet Durable Motor with Reverse Function, Easy Cleaning High Yield Vertical Juicer, Tritan Material Non-toxic, BPA Free
feature_bullets: The strainers is designed to prevent residue build-up, simply cleaned by rinsing under water
Extra big 3 inch feed chute allows for juicing whole fruits and vegetables with minimal preparation
Specialized 150 watt induction motor crushes the toughest ingredients with ease
Works on fruits, leafy greens and soybeans. Switch to the blank strainer to make frozen desserts
Built with food grade materials. Tritan anti-oxidation materials, BPA-free

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars139 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
